com.gdxgame.core.utils

Class GameUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gdxgame.core.utils.GameUtils

  • public final class GameUtils
extends Object
    GameUtils is a general game utility class. It contains utility methods for game objects and also methods to manipulate the game configuration file for desktop applications. TODO add support for android and WebGL configuration files (check libgdx Preferences)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String getCfgPreferenceValue(String key)
      returns value of the specified key within the game config preference

    • Method Detail

      • renderGameObject

        public static void renderGameObject(SpriteBatch spriteBatch,
                                    Camera camera,
                                    AnimatedGameObject gameObj,
                                    AnimatedSprite sprite)
        renders an animated game object using the given animated sprite. The method checks if the game object is within the camera viewport. If it is not within the camera viewport then the render call will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        spriteBatch - SpriteBatch to render the AnimatedSprite
        camera - game camera to check if the game object is within the view port
        gameObj - game object to be rendered
        sprite - sprite to be used for the game object rendering

      • isWithinCameraView

        public static boolean isWithinCameraView(Camera camera,
                                         GameObject gameObj)
        checks if a game object is within the given camera's viewport.
        Parameters:
        camera - game camera to check if the game object is within the view port
        gameObj - game object to check
        Returns:
        true if game object is within camera viewport. false otherwise.

      • intersects

        public static boolean intersects(GameObject gameObjA,
                                 GameObject gameObjB)
        checks if two game objects are colliding using their bounding rectangles
        Parameters:
        gameObjA - game object A
        gameObjB - game object B
        Returns:
        true if the game objects are colliding. false otherwise.

      • loadCfgPreference

        public static void loadCfgPreference()
        loads the game config preference. The config preference contains information like the resolution, music volume or sound volume. The file path is defined in the GameConstants

      • setCfgPreferenceValue

        public static void setCfgPreferenceValue(String key,
                                         String value)
        adds or updates an entry in the game config preference
        Parameters:
        key - key of the entry
        value - value of the entry

      • saveCfgPreference

        public static void saveCfgPreference()
        stores the current config preference on the local file system of the user

      • getCfgPreferenceValue

        public static String getCfgPreferenceValue(String key)
        returns value of the specified key within the game config preference
        Parameters:
        key - key of the entry
        Returns:
        null if entry cannot be found in the config preference. Otherwise the value of the specified key will be returned.

      • getLocalizedLabel

        public static String getLocalizedLabel(String labelKey)
        returns localized label labelKey out of the label bundle file. The label bundle file path is specified within the GameConstants class (check LABE_BUNDLE_PATH)
        Parameters:
        labelKey - key to be searched within the label bundle
        Returns:
        localized label of key labelKey
